title: Emerald Polki Drop Earrings - 'Paccha Kundan Jhumki'
materials: Uncut Polki Diamonds (total weight approx. 2.5 carats
features: Classic Polki diamond arrangement in a floral motif, each diamond carefully set to maximize brilliance. Intricate gold wirework detailing adds depth and character. The vivid green emerald cabochon at the top provides a striking contrast, enhancing the piece's elegance. Handcrafted using traditional Kundan setting techniques unique to Hyderabad.
occasions: Perfect for weddings (especially the 'Sangeet' and 'Muhurtham' ceremonies)
festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
or special events. These earrings can also be styled with modern outfits for a touch of traditional flair.
description: A stunning blend of traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship and modern design sensibilities. The genuine emerald and uncut polki diamonds ensure heirloom quality, making it a valuable investment. The floral design is both timeless and universally appealing. The Hyderabadi Polish provides a rich, lasting shine. These 'Bugada' style earrings are lightweight and comfortable for extended wear.
